title.narrative: Preventive Conservation of the Collections of the National Muse Vivant in Bujumbura

description.narrative: To support the preventive conservation of pre-colonial ethnographic collections of the National Muse Vivant in Bujumbura. The museums fragile objects, made of bark, wood, papyrus, animal skins, and other organic materials, are currently stored in unprotected locations and exposed to environmental and other hazards. This project involves a conservation needs assessment, the installation of appropriate display and storage spaces, and the implementation of security measures.
